title: RSVP
content:
Hello, can you identify this script word "RSVP" font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rsvp_3804.jpg)

Font: 

 Anna Clara 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rsvp.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704/http:/typophile.com/files/rsvp.jpg) | 106.7 KB |
author: evelinat

comments.content: Could be [Anna Clara](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/anna-clara) using some stylistic alternates (/k, /t, /b...).

Ryuk nailed it.

Definitely Anna Clara, with (k, t, b) and without (rsvp) Stylistic Set 1 turned on:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AnnaClara1_3678.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AnnaClara2_6100.png)
